articles.author: Arnav Pandya
articles.title: Bitten By The Nvidia Bug? How To Go About Buying Shares Directly Abroad - NDTV Profit
articles.description: Indian investors, too, can buy equity shares on the U.S. exchanges, but they need to follow the required procedure. This process will also give rise to several challenges, here's how it can be handled
articles.content:
There are two aspects of the tax element of an investment in stocks abroad.
The first impact hits the investor at the time of making the investment because, under the rules, there will be a tax coll… [+876 chars]
